reviewText: This was hands down my daughters favorite birthday gift this year. She is one year old avid maggie fan. This is a great movie to keep kids attention.
Toddlers love it! High quality discontinued tv show. Has great teaching episodes, pure quality script! Definitely recommend for your collection!
Good quality, son loves these movies. Wish it was back on TV. Funny, loving and caring themes while holding their attention

My kids (ages 4 and 2) love Maggie and the Ferocious Beast, and love to watch this DVD over and over.  I don't mind them watching it because it is educational and Maggie is very imaginative.  The DVD teaches manners and how to make believe.  I recommend this DVD it is light hearted, no violence, absolutely nothing in it that a child shouldn't see.
